data.eml:eml: The genus Centorisoma Becker in China, with a key to world species (Diptera, Chloropidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xiaoyan, Yang, Ding (2012): The genus Centorisoma Becker in China, with a key to world species (Diptera, Chloropidae). Zootaxa 3361: 18-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211914
